name: FlowerBot
description:
In the near future, victims of our own gluttonous obesity, humans will depend more than ever on the advanced technological FlowerBot, whose sole purpose is to roam our gardens and nurture, tend, and cultivate the vegetation, aiding in our survival.

We all wait in fear, helpless to our inevitable surrender to technology... Fatal Error, Rise of the Robots!

See her in motion at https://youtu.be/xq2gcB8XTzY

model: Sawyer Croft
body paint by Roustan (bodypainter.com)
